summary: A potion that turns you into a vampire! :D
descriptionHtml:
Potion that ,currently, instantly turns you into the Hunter of the Night.
I couldn\'t find any potions or alternatives to become a vampire without having to fight with a vampire. 

It is crafted at a cooking pot using vampire dust and human hearth! 

In future i will put in a dungeon or make someone sell it.

This is my first upload to nexus, so any help or tip how to make it better is always welcome! :D

UPDATE 1:

Okay, now i want to add a potion recipe, but i don\'t know how to add POTION recipes... Anyone with knowledge on that subject PM me an hopefully version 1.0 will be live before you know it! :D      
   
UPDATE 2:

Version 1.0 is LIVE you can now craft the potion!
author: Kane2387
